title: Bug 101187 - Localization key field is mandatory when adding
description: When attempting to add a new localization key, the system does not allow leaving the key field blank. If the key field is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: The properties file contains a blank localization key, but it has a valid value.
EB: The externalized text should be properly displayed in the chart title.
SR:
1. Open the application and go to the localization settings.
2. Try to add a new localization key by leaving the key field blank.
3. Save and check if the externalized text is displayed correctly in the chart title.
